name: Pixel Wars: Nightmares of the Battlefield
name_original: Pixel Wars: Nightmares of the Battlefield
description:
War.  War never changes. In the year 2100, the world is a desolate wasteland torn apart by never-ending conflicts.  Amidst the chaos, a pixelated rubber chicken that could bring an new era of peace was discovered.  But war never changes.  The news of its discovery spread, and soon, an enemy nation launches an attack on the city. 

An Pixel Art game created for Libgdx Game Jam 24.  It was supposed to be a horror pixel art game to show the horrors of war, but my art was lacking.  So, i pivoted into a tower defense at the last minute.  


Goal: survive the invasion
A - place a grunt, melee unit with short range, but high damage
S - place a sniper, range unit with long range, but low damage
D - place a iceman, short range, slows units, medium damage
To place the units, after summoning them you have to click with the mouse
